page.title: 18Attitudes to living in Unst
page.content: What are the advantages and disadvantages of living in Unst? The table below was compiled from questionnaire answers given by adults resident in this D block. ADVANTAGES 1.Quiet,peaceful setting.......40% 2.Natural,unspoilt beauty......18% 3.Safe environment.............18% 4.Small,integrated community...14% 5.Wildlife......................6% 6.Relaxed way of life...........2% 7.Central on island of Unst.....2% DISADVANTAGES 1.Distance and cost of travel to Mainland U.K................22% 2.High cost of living..........19% 3.Lack of employment(esp. for young people)..................16% 4.Lack of entertainment........16% 5.Ferry Timetable unsuitable...10% 6.Distance from shops..........10%
